attributes.action: Reject proposal for Parking Permits by Essex Council (Amd no. 24) Order 201X
attributes.additional_details:
Futher information is available on :
http://www/1.parkingpartnership.org/north/mipermit

In addition to signing this petition please submit your objection to:

parking@colchester.gov.uk by 16TH NOVEMBER DEADLINE

Do not allow local councils to bully residents into paying to park at their own home when already paying high council and car tax.  It is disgraceful.
attributes.background: North Essex Parking Partnership on behalf of Essex County Council are proposing to introduce parking permits for residents.  Limit of 2 vehicles per residence @ £130 per ann and to charge for visitors to park at your home.  This is purely a money making exercise and brings no benefit to residents.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking permits are the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.essex.gov.uk/Your-Council/Consultation-Feedback/Pages/Petitions.aspx
